Task: Rate how sensational the langague of a finding is.

💡Sensational text intends to spark the interest of a reader, make them curious or elicit an emotional reaction. Cues for senationalism could be:

  • dramatic, urgent, exaggerated langage: life-changing, unparalleled performance, revolutionary, transformative, miracle treatment
  • informal or colloquial language: amps up the efficiency, They ran some solid experiments to back this up

Click next to go over some examples.
